The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
[[condition#c1 type="notice"]]You must include a NOTICE file when provided by the work.[[/condition#c1]] [[condition#c2 type="patent"]]This license includes an express [[patent#p1]]patent grant[[/patent#p1]].[[/condition#c2]] [[condition#c3 type="trademark"]]Trade names, trademarks, service marks are not licensed.[[/condition#c3]]
[[disclaimer#d1]]THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND...[[/disclaimer#d1]]
[[relation#rel1]]Note: Patent grant [[/relation#rel1]][[xref#xr1 ref="#p1"]]overlaps with rights granted above[[/xref#xr1]].
